website_summaries.verdict: A unique and large fort that blows up with a fan for indoor tent fun.
pros: Folds up very small for storage
Includes a mesh divider to keep kids from getting near the fan and to keep the interior of the fort from becoming windy
Packs small but inflates to a large size
Easy to set up or take down
cons: Fan has to stay on in order to keep the fort inflated

customer_reviews.title: Works great! I can set it up in minutes when I don’t want to look at my family anymore.
customer_reviews.text: Hours of fun. This is the fastest fort you can set up when someone begins to speak to you. Now I don’t have to look at my family when they are annoying me. Extra bonus, you can turn up the fan and now you can’t hear them either. Packs up small so it’s good for hiding from co-workers too. Very well-made.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Isaacs

customer_reviews.title: A+ grade from this mom!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for my son for 9th birthday. The four people in our family and our dog fit in there with room to spare. It is such a great fort and packs up so small. I was worried about the coldness due to the fan, but it is not a problem at all. We threw a couple blankets in there when feeling chilly and it was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle S.

customer_reviews.title: Tent Is Fun / BEWARE OF FAN
customer_reviews.text: The tent is somewhat fun for the kids. However, it is very cold inside. The fan is blowing cold air onto them the whole time playing. We live in California and I'm wearing a blanket under the tent when I play with them. WARNING: Amazon recommends the tent be bought with this product:  I HIGHLY HIGHLY recommend against it. The fan is very light weight and falls over often. The holes in the fan are big enough for an adult's fingers to easily slip through when trying to turn it on and off. It is a terrible combination and I highly recommend avoiding the fan that Amazon suggests be paired with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Tetlow

customer_reviews.title: The kids love this! Easy set up and take down
customer_reviews.text: The kids love this! Easy set up and take down. My favorite part is how compact it is for storing. Wonderful product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s absolutely as fun as it looks, they’ll love it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 5 year old daughter. The constant challenge of trying to build new forts with chairs and blankets has gotten the best of me. This is awesome and she loves it! The first day, she brought pillows and blankets inside and wanted her cousin to sleep over. Inflated instantly and easily. The only “bad” thing is, the hook and loop fastener they provide you with to attach the fort to the fan keeps pulling off, so some beefier Velcro May be in order.
customer_reviews.author: Cdiz75

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it!
customer_reviews.text: My girls love to make blanket forts but don't like to clean up the mess. I saw this and thought it would be a great option. They love it, they have slept in it every night this week...... Its about 6 foot wide and 4 foot tall when blown up.
customer_reviews.author: Dlovefaithhope

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing!!! Kids love it!!! They have a fort and my couch is in one piece!! PRICELESS!!!
customer_reviews.author: Stax

customer_reviews.title: Kid love it, only issue I have is the fan ...
customer_reviews.text: Kids love it, only issue I have is the fan is difficult to attach with the tape provided. Get creative with the fan assembly and a screwdriver and you will not have that problem anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My kids love this tent! Easy to setup and take down.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Clausen

customer_reviews.title: kids LOVE it
customer_reviews.text: My boys are notorious for dragging in every chair and blanket in our house to build forts. This became a perfect solution to tame the mess but still provide the same amount of fun. It's spacious. It's setup and take down only takes seconds. I gave it four out of five stars because I paid extra to purchase the one with the glow in the dark stars and we're finding they don't glow at all. I haven't found a way to reach out to the company but if a resolution is found, I can update. Overall, this was a great addition for families with young kids!
customer_reviews.author: TheMacDonalds

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Awesome fort! Much bigger than I expected. Stays perfectly inflated with a cheap box fan.
customer_reviews.author: kris rubio

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for kids
customer_reviews.text: The best part is that kids can enter and exit anywhere they feel like. We booked up the box fan and it did force the tent to lift off the floor a bit, so we had to turn the fan on low. Problem fixed immediately and still kept the tent blown up. Wonderful for all age kids. Also because of the fan, it never gets too hot in the tent. Plenty of room for 5-6 kids. Folds up so small and super lightweight. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: AJ13

customer_reviews.title: Sanity saving winter activity!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son for Christmas, hoping it would help on these short cold days where we can't get the kids outside to play as much. After a quick (maybe 10 minute?) initial set-up, this thing kept my children entertained for HOURS. They even slept in it. We've spent the last few winters trying to assemble forts the old fashioned way (blankets, furniture, etc.) and this was SO much better. Less disruptive, less mess to clean up, and my children loved having their own space to disappear into. Arguably the best gift I gave this Christmas. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Shelly Hastings Suhr

customer_reviews.title: kids absolutely loved this
customer_reviews.text: easy to assemble, just attach a box fan. i tried a circular fan, but it did not work quite as well as a box fan. tent inflates right away and has plenty of room for 2-4 kids inside. my two take blankets, pillows and books in and enjoy for several hours at a time. the fan also keeps good air circulating to keep them cool. enter and exit by lifting side and rolling under side. tent momentarily slightly deflates, but comes back as soon as side lowered back down. did i mention the kids love it....
customer_reviews.author: S Lewis

customer_reviews.title: So easy to set up and it actually fits "back" into ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the coolest thing ever! So easy to set up and it actually fits "back" into the bag it came in!! Amazing. Simple and just so worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hours of entertainment= Happy Mom
customer_reviews.text: I don't usually write reviews but Santa hit it out of the park with this one! He must have known that although Mommy loves when the kids entertain themselves without the use of technology, she can't stand how they take the cushions off the couch when building a fort. This air fort is the perfect solution. It's essentially a parachute with a tunnel. You'll need a box fan (not included) and that's it. It fit my entire family of 5 with room to spare. My kids (almost 10,7, and 5 have been in here giggling for 45 minutes and counting. Good job Santa!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome gift, but 2 flaws
customer_reviews.text: Make sure you read the fine print that you need to buy (or already have) a box fan for it to work - my husband didn't see that, and it became not sure an awesome bargain gift when we had to follow it up with a box fan. Also, the family we sent it to had little kids (perfect for this, right?). Nope - they refuse to get into it because the box fan noise scares them... So.... I HIGHLY recommend this as long as you already have/are prepared to buy a box fan AND the kids using it will be okay with the noise from the box fan.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kids Love the AirFort! Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: My kids love this air fort. It's super easy to use and is HUGE! All four of my kids can play inside without issue. It did arrive with one small hole in the seam, but it still inflated. I was able to easily patch it with seam tape that I had on hand. I LOVE that it folds up and stores away in a little drawstring bag. I found that it inflated very quickly with the box fan on the 3rd setting, and then stayed inflated on only the 1st setting. (Box fan not included. I bought a cheap one at a local store) Note that with the fan running, it gets chilly in the room in fall/winter.
customer_reviews.author: Mommy Knows What's Best (.com)

customer_reviews.title: Bigger than it looks
customer_reviews.text: Love! love! love! This was the best gift of the year! So easy to put up, they can do it themselves! just a few velcro straps and a fan! It cleans up so easy and compact. So it's a plus for me and them! When its inflated, it is huge! It isnt imposing at all when inflated, but Our family of 4 and a big dog fit inside for family game time and book reading. Such a cozy hideaway. It will be a favorite for a long time. Would be fun for kids of all ages and abilities, and also wont crash down if kids get wild like other fort kits we've had. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Iprollysolit

customer_reviews.title: Creates a great reading space
customer_reviews.text: Our grandchildren are with us for the summer and with the hot days and no swim parks open this has been the perfect "surprise of the day" gift. the fan keeps the space cool, they have their own private spot usually for reading or a perfect spot for a nap. Another great find!
customer_reviews.author: Anita S.

customer_reviews.title: Such an awesome idea!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this fort! Works just as intended. I definitely recommend this purchase. It is made up of a parachute like material and holds it's form well on the low setting. I usually inflate it on high. It takes about 30 seconds and my son loves to watch it go up. It has a nice storage bag for when you're not using it. We've been having family game night in it. It provides enough air that you are not hot but the game board pieces don't move around. So cool!
customer_reviews.author: MechInspector

customer_reviews.title: Some Might Enjoy
customer_reviews.text: If your kid enjoys loud fans, high speed wind and a constantly collapsing tent buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Amazing fort for kids!
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love this air fort. We had never seen this anywhere before and so we bought it for our 4 year old for his birthday. The set up is super easy. You take it out of the bag, put the velcro pieces on the box fan (not included-must buy separately) attach the air fort to the fan via the velcro strips and turn on the fan. It takes less than 30 seconds to get it up and running. My 6 year old really enjoys it too. The 2 boys sit the air fort and play games and they love it!
customer_reviews.author: Tina K

customer_reviews.title: Clever idea; stars don’t glow
customer_reviews.text: It’s a cool concept, but I’m super disappointed the stars don’t glow. (I bought the starry night one and paid more for it, expecting the stars to glow in the dark. They don’t.) If my kids were younger than 12 and 10, they’d probably have been more excited...even without glowing stars.
customer_reviews.author: msdodgrblu

customer_reviews.title: We love this fort!
customer_reviews.text: Our kids and their friends LOVE this fort. It is easy set up, fits away very nicely in their closet, and provides kids of all ages a ton of fun. We have a fairly large family with children ranging in age from 1 year to 12 years and they all love it. I bought this as a birthday gift for my son and have bought several more as gifts for their friends and other family members. It’s a nice alternative to a gift card or video game that is ALWAYS on the gift list.
customer_reviews.author: E. Minnick

customer_reviews.title: Great kid gift!!
customer_reviews.text: We LOVE our air fort! My daughter saved up her money and bought the glow in the dark fort all by herself! She was so proud of herself. It has great durability! The stars are incredibly bright at night! So much so, she doesn't need a nightlight when sleeping in the air fort. We bought one for our cousins, as a joint present. They were THRILLED!! But once we set it up, we discovered it had a hole in it. SO disappointed! I did reach out to the company. They did call me back, however, once I called them back - I was not able to get ahold of anyone again. Hoping to resolve the problem soon!!
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: My kids (7 and 3) always want to make forts using the couch cushions. This drives me nuts and makes the couch filthy. Then I stumbled across this. Problem solved. We leave it hooked up to the fan and leave the fan in the toy room. Kids turn on the fan and Bam! Fort. The fan can be left on low and it stays up great. I'm about 5-10 and I fit in there comfortably seated and could probably have about 3-4 people my size join me. Very happy with it
customer_reviews.author: D. Dahlbeck

customer_reviews.title: Easy - and hours of fun... (and added saftey)
customer_reviews.text: I knew this product would be perfect... but The only thing that scared me was a tunnel to a fan and small fingers. When I researched and looked at competitors and prices.... I settled on this one due to the added measure of the net at the beginning of the tunnel. It is perfect. Stands up... fun... and safe. We (2 adults and 2 kids fit in it easily and have even played a few board games in it.)
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Allen

customer_reviews.title: My 8 yr old daughter absolutely loves this fort, and so do I!
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old absolutely loves this thing!! She goes in there to do her distance learning school work, pretend play, watch a show and have a snack, or if she’s really hot from playing outside she comes in and asks for me to set it up because the fan helps cool her off. Probably the nicest thing about this compared to other forts we’ve had is that it packs up nicely and takes up very little room when out away. There are no poles of crazy instructions on how to assemble or disassemble. I would HIGHLY recommend. Just make sure you order a fan too if you don’t have one already!
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: A hit with our grandchildren!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This could not have been a better gift for remote learning during lockdown. Our grandchildren, ages 9 & 7, love this. They are doing their school work in it, with our son using his laptop in there to get his work done also. It is well constructed and ample in size. I am always afraid to order on line but we sure lucked out this time. Also, when they are done with it , it just deflates and goes against the wall until they blow it up again. Love to be able to give a good review.
customer_reviews.author: marymc

customer_reviews.title: Really fun!
customer_reviews.text: The Easter bunny brought this for my 7 year old son. He loves it! Especially during the pandemic and stay at home orders it has been so much fun! He uses it everyday for his zoom calls with school and even his 13yo sister gets in there with him to play video games inside with him! Really worth the money and the glow in the dark stars really glow!
customer_reviews.author: Momof4

customer_reviews.title: Quick set up and tear down for lots of fun
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to help entertain my son during the COVID-19 stay at home order. It’s nice because it quickly inflated by simply turning on the fan and when done, it collapses to be no bigger than a bed sheet. He absolutely loves it and wants us all to be in it all the time. It can get cool with the fan blowing on you constantly, so bundle up in the cooler weather.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: My 3 year old daughter loves her star tent.
customer_reviews.text: Once you velcro this to the fan it's easy setup. I have enough fans that I made one a dedicated fan for this tent. It's durable and thin enough to blow up on even the low setting because I have it attached tightly around the fan. IT fits perfectly on a king size bed as well. The stars don't glow as well as they could because the stars have to be on the outside of the tent to charge up and glow. That glow isn't transferred very well into the tent. As a result the stars are much brighter outside of the tent than inside.
customer_reviews.author: Daveneo6

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Love this fort. My 9 year old loves building forts but shes a little big for the ones she builds and they keep falling especially when she tries to include her 2 year old brother. She always wants me to join in on her fort fun but I couldn't. This was big enough for her and myself to enjoy. I was a little worried the fan would make it super windy and annoying inside but it didn't. This was a great buy and I would definitely purchase another.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Schnurr

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Sauce! Great for play.
customer_reviews.text: My preteen kids love this so much. Their friends and they love playing survival in tents but they always destroy them. This has no bottom to rip and the fan keeps it cool inside. Can’t wait to take this out front in the summer. For indoor play it’s been fantastic. Best gift by far. It’s easy to set up and store. Box fans work best and they are cheap. Be sure to buy one to go with this.
customer_reviews.author: BoodlesBecky

customer_reviews.title: My Kids Love It!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of those "Why didn't I think of that" products. So simple to set up, to use, then to store away. Comes with a pouch for when you're ready to put it away. Includes the velcro strips needed to attache to any box fan. Includes instruction on how to set up, but honestly, you wont' need them. Material is very durable, seems to be stitched to take a beating. My kids play rough so the only problem I've had so far is the fan can fall over if someone tugs at the fort. other than that it's great. I'd definitely buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: jason sparks

customer_reviews.title: Quick and easy fort with minor flaws
customer_reviews.text: I love how quick and easy it is to assemble and put away. It really irritates me how the bottom hovers 3 inches above the ground at all times though. I so wish they had thought of a weighted bottom. Would have been a very easy fix. This is the only reason I did not give 5 stars. If it would sit properly against the floor it would be perfect. Still a fun, quick fort for my kids though. They are pleased.
customer_reviews.author: J Carlyle

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, love!
customer_reviews.text: The kids LOVED this!! My nephews came down for a stay-cation and I wanted something to entertain them that wouldn’t break the bank. They were obsessed with this!!! They slept in it every night. We set up blankets, pillows, and a portable DVD player for movie night! Easy to use, just need a boxed fan! Setup includes ability to plug in fan, and enjoy hours of bliss as your child is entertained!
customer_reviews.author: Lora

customer_reviews.title: Sigh... completely far from being a "fort."
customer_reviews.text: This is easily the worst end/usable product ever. Marketing wise and concept....good. But having to also buy a portable fan, the fact a constant wind flow is directly on your kid(s), and if your idea is that your kids will hang out in it for more than 5 minutes (or use it for a completely different product use)... than you are wasting your time.
customer_reviews.author: RB

customer_reviews.title: It's as cool as it looks
customer_reviews.text: Initially, I purchased this for my toddler so he can have a cool fort but I have decided to steal it from him and use it as my own fort. It can fit 4 reasonably sized adults (if you're over 6'2, you're unreasonably tall... you should have stopped growing 4 inches ago). I wish I had this as a child but I am happy that I can use it as an adult.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: Really awesome fort/tent. It is larger than I expected, which is great but barely fits in my living room. I thought the starry night one would be too dark inside, but it's not! You can see out when you're inside but no one can see in! My kids love it so much! I'd say wait until your children are a little older and can sit inside of the fort calmly as my 1.5 year old constantly goes in and out and allows the air to escape making the fort collapse often. It is truly a great product! 👍👍👍
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Eddy

customer_reviews.title: Fun family time or rainy day lifesaver!
customer_reviews.text: My boys love their air fort! Such a fun space for them on a day we can’t get outside to play. ⛈ They were so excited that my husband and I can fit in it with them. It doesn’t take up much space when it’s down especially compared to other pop up tents we have had before with the metal frames. I also like that air is constantly circulating with the fan so that it doesn’t get hot and stuffy.
customer_reviews.author: jljl

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 12-year-old and seven-year-old for Christmas. They both really enjoy it. They normally set up forts and like to sleep under them. Now they said this up and sleep under it. I also like it because of the Box fan going it muffles the sound’s. Makes it a quieter evening for mom and dad.
customer_reviews.author: J. Upton

customer_reviews.title: Affordabale and Works as Advertised
customer_reviews.text: For the price it's kind of crazy to actually get a product that does what it says. This little air fort was cool and I wish I had one when I was a kid. Throw the elastic straps around a box fan, throw it on high, thing inflates like a little circus tent. It came with some 3M tack-on velcro strips to help secure the elastic to the fan, if needed, we haven't had to use those yet.
customer_reviews.author: Mo

customer_reviews.title: great for imaginative play
customer_reviews.text: I thought this blow up tent was so cute. It really is adorable but my kids just jump on top of it instead of playing under it. Also you have to brace the box fan because it CONSTANTLY tips over. It is a pretty cheap material for the price you pay. For reference my children are 2yr old and 3.5yr old. However we have had this for several months without it ripping. Only play with it about once a month though.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole D.

customer_reviews.title: It’s a fun large easy to use fort
customer_reviews.text: My kids love this! It’s huge too which a a plus! I was able to go in there with my 4 kids and we fit great. They brought pillows blankets and books. We had fun. The only downside is that the fan is easy to pull over if the sides are pushed on too much by younger kids.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Van Lear

customer_reviews.title: Read the description first
customer_reviews.text: I should have read the description better. This thing has no floor and needs a box fan to work. Also, based on the product photos it apparently is only for super happy white people.
customer_reviews.author: Felicia P.

customer_reviews.title: Have kids? Must buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: This simple little, compact tent is amazing!!!!! You WILL need to purchase a box fan separately. I have three boys ... who love tents. This has been a great gift! My 6 and 8 year old fit in it with plenty of room for their pillows, blankets and dog! Not only does it puff out fast it’s just as fast to store.. its it’s on little bag! If you have kid you will not be disappointed with the AirFort!
customer_reviews.author: Clifford E. Dyson

customer_reviews.title: Dosnt stay erect
customer_reviews.text: Every time the kiddos move inside this tent like fort the fan falls down deflatingbthe whole unit. I choose to return it after 20 minutes of use.
customer_reviews.author: tanya Metz

customer_reviews.title: Defective upon opening, fixed with minor repair.
customer_reviews.text: When I received this it had two openings on seams that were not properly sewn. A needle and thread and 2 hours later and it is now fully functional.
customer_reviews.author: Evan

customer_reviews.title: So cool
customer_reviews.text: I did this with a bed sheet when I was a kid. Only complaint I have is I wish I thought of it. My girls love it so much. Wish it came with a fan.
customer_reviews.author: cari

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Kid's will love it!
customer_reviews.text: My 8yr old loves this tent! I was kind of sceptical ordering this because of some of the bad reviews.. I'm so glad I went ahead and bought it! My 8 year old can set this up herself. As long as you make sure the front of the box fan is covered with the tent fabric it doesn't lose air like another review said. My daughter has used it every day since we got it (7 days so far) and we haven't had an issue yet.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Grant

customer_reviews.title: a full day of entertainment
customer_reviews.text: Like many others, my husband and I are both currently working from home while also caring for our 2 small children. This makes it very hard to get work and entertain them simultaneously. We got this air fort for them and it provided a FULL work day of entertainment. My kids played in it all day and had so much fun! My husband and I were able to get our work done. Not only that, they didn't fight us on eating lunch because they wanted to get back to their castle ASAP
customer_reviews.author: Mngpack

customer_reviews.title: Sets up fast! Super fun!
customer_reviews.text: Very lightweight and compact for storage while being exceptionally structurally sound. Sets up in seconds with a box fan (we use a round floor fan and it works great). Kids love the private space and I love the fact that they will not get hurt playing inside. Great peek in mesh window with awesome airflow! Also its big enough and with the comfortable air flow...dads can hide and sneak a nap!
customer_reviews.author: Party Truck

customer_reviews.title: Save your money, go buy a tent
customer_reviews.text: We literally threw it out. You need a fan and even with a fan, the whole fort poofs out and off the ground. Not what was advertised.
customer_reviews.author: The Teacher

customer_reviews.title: Make nerf better
customer_reviews.text: this thing is the bees knees! my kids love it, it's the only big item the have that is zero work to set up. my 11 month old love going in there with the big kids and of course she love to walk up and fall on it trapping all the kids in there. this thing is made well it takes all the abuse of 4 kids freaking out stuck under a thin sheet. it has worked really well as a nerf fort which is a big plus for my son
customer_reviews.author: stinky

customer_reviews.title: As long as you have a box fan- you can make a fort!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product, what a fun and easy way to build a fort. My son loved it and it was plenty large enough for him and a friend (he's 9). He loves building forts so this is a fun addition for him and it's nice that it comes down and stuffs into a little bag and we don't have to step over anything for days on end.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: I can't believe we lived without this!
customer_reviews.text: I got this fort thinking my kids would enjoy it for a bit, and then they'd forget about it like they do everything else. They played in this fort daily for a solid month or more, and they still set it up multiple times per week! I'm pleased with how easy it is to set up too. They are able to do it all on their own (they are 7 & 8).
customer_reviews.author: Jeff & Nikki Gora

customer_reviews.title: This is such a fun family activity
customer_reviews.text: My kids LOVE this. We easily fit 3 kids and 2 adults inside. With room for more. I highly recommend this as a gift. There is safety mesh on the inside leaving a empty space between the inside and the fan. So I don’t have to worry about my kids messing with the fan. It’s a lot of fun. We will even bring in blankets and have a reading day.
customer_reviews.author: Weaks

customer_reviews.title: Won’t inflate, arrived with hole in the material.
customer_reviews.text: There’s a large hole in the side of the fort by the fan attachment so it wont inflate. This was a gift for my son for Christmas and now there are no more available, he is devastated.
customer_reviews.author: KYBaseballMom

customer_reviews.title: Better off with a sheet and chair tent
customer_reviews.text: Was so excited for this, unfortunately that excitement ended very quickly! This was a joke! Even in perfect no wind conditions this tent doesn’t stay up! The fans always fall , even when kids are super gentle (which young boys are all but this). My son was so excited, as were his young friends, but this turned to tears and frustration as soon as they tried to play. Do not waste your money, as you will be surely disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Kelley Hagerman

customer_reviews.title: Best gift for your little fort builders!!!
customer_reviews.text: This was my child’s favorite gift this year!! Super durable (my kids play really rough!) The set up is so easy that my kids can do it themselves. It’s cute and easy to travel with and store away because of the pouch it comes with. I love that it doesn’t have a floor so clean up is super easy - you don’t have to dump all their toys out like a traditional play tent. I Love love love!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Marzan

customer_reviews.title: GREAT TODDLER GIFT
customer_reviews.text: We LOVE our air fort. It’s big enough that two adults and a toddler can hang out with plenty of room, but folds up into a pillow-case sized bag when we’re not using it. It takes thirty seconds to set up with a standard box fan. It stays inflated with the fan on the lowest setting, so there is a breeze but it isn’t uncomfortable. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffaney Hicks Brewer

customer_reviews.title: too big
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like this, I saw some commercials a while back. Issues include its freaking huge.... and the options to affix to a fan are kind of weak. Its pretty cool, my kid likes. We dont have a small house and this just takes up so much room.
customer_reviews.author: Barrett

customer_reviews.title: Great fun for kids of all ages!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for my 4 year old son and he loves it! It is so easy to put up and provides hours of fun for him. I always struggled to help him make forts out of blankets and pillows. The Air Fort is a life saver and an ingenious idea! And it fits a lot of people - my husband, myself, my son and our dog all fit in their comfortably!
customer_reviews.author: Lotts-Donovan

customer_reviews.title: I'd buy this again & again
customer_reviews.text: EVERY PARENT needs to get this for their kiddos!! My boys are always building forts..making a mess and they wouldnt stay up. I surprised them with this and they LOVE it!! I got in with them. We got it today & were going to have movie night in it tonight. They want to sleep in it lol. No complaints. 100% satisfied! Going to buy another one so they have one of their own.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun but frustrating! Updated.
customer_reviews.text: Large space! Easy to use, but the Velcro they send doesn’t stay stuck to the fan. It’s was extremely frustrating to my kids and myself. The majority of play time was spent resticking the Velcro to allow air flow. Update- After contacting the company they sent new Velcro for the fan- and it works perfect! Although we were inconvenienced for a few days- my boys are so happy with this air fort.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: How fun!
customer_reviews.text: This is so cool! My boys can set up their own fort in a flash, we can fit in there with them and the dogs like to join us, too! The fabric is lightweight and there's a screen between the main area and the fan. That gives me peace of mind! I wish there was a bigger version so we could sit in there in our camp chairs! Lol
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stinks...
customer_reviews.text: Didn't realize you needed to buy fan separately..$50 for this? Yet to use, has sat in my son's closet. Need to purchase fan to use. Ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: Julie M.

customer_reviews.title: So fun. Easy to use and stores away easily
customer_reviews.text: Hours of fun with this tent. So easy to hook up to a box fan. Inflates in seconds . My kids love to hide out in this fort. All four my kids fit inside and can read books, watch their tablets or just play. My favorite part is when they are done it takes just a minute to take down and rolls up to a small ball for easy storage.
customer_reviews.author: 05goodwin05

customer_reviews.title: Easy to setup and fun for the kids
customer_reviews.text: Material is very lightweight and easy to assemble and takedown. Once you are done, you just fold it up and put it in the carrying bag that came with it. I would have liked to see the material part that touches the floor to be weighted that way it keeps the fort on the ground but that doesn't take away from it at all.
customer_reviews.author: Marlon F.

customer_reviews.title: Great personal space and relaxing spot for the kids.
customer_reviews.text: The kids tossed this aside Christmas morning due to not looking like a cool toy....UNTIL, I blew this thing up! They didn't wanna get out of it for the rest of the day. This will be an awesome personal space when camping or just chilling out in the yard.
customer_reviews.author: grjones

customer_reviews.title: SIMPLY GENIUS! A hit for kids & parents!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace the pop up tents I have for my kids. I wasn’t sure if my older one (9) would like it but both my kids love it! It was so quick to install and the kids and I got right in! Since the fan blows the air to inflate the tent, I don’t need to worry about the kids getting too hot like they do in regular play tents. Bonus- It comes with a drawstring bag for storage and makes it very portable!
customer_reviews.author: mamadre

customer_reviews.title: simple but fun toy
customer_reviews.text: This inflatable fort was a big hit with grandchildren. All you need is a box fan and the fort quickly puffs up to a fun shelter. There is no floor to the fort, so the kids can duck in and out of it easily. There is a mesh screen between the fan and interior to keep kids from sitting too close to the fan. The fan must be kept running to keep the fort up, so be sure you fan has the "feet" on to keep it upright. When not in use, the fort can be bundled into a small storage sack.
customer_reviews.author: KA

customer_reviews.title: Super Fun for Kids (and Adults)
customer_reviews.text: This fort could not be easier to set up. Literally turn on a fan and you are in business. My kids love it. I didn't consider that to enter/exit the fort you need to lift up the bottom (no door of course or the fan wouldn't inflate it) so the fort deflates a bit but re-inflates quickly. Keep in mind that the fan must run the entire time so if cold air and noise are issues for you or your kids I would reconsider this purchase. But we love it.
customer_reviews.author: michele

customer_reviews.title: Great for all ages!
customer_reviews.text: This has been a Godsend during quarantine!! The little kids can get it set up themselves and play in it for a while. Even the big kids were using it as their “study area”. The best part is that it fits into a tiny bag so I don’t have to figure out where to store some kind of monstrosity. It’d be a great gift or just fun for kids to play in.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Unique gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son for Christmas as his regular tent broke. He was thrilled as it is unique and he loved that it needed a fan to blow it up. It’s very roomy once it’s blown up and all four of my kids can be in it. It can get a little cold inside the tent because of the fan but as my son said, just grab extra blankets. I would purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: mommyof4

customer_reviews.title: Great fort the kids and even better hide-out for adults!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this fort for 2 and 4 year old but I spend more time in it hiding from my wife. The box fan (not included) drowns out the noise of me clicking on my phone and the inside is rather spacious, I can sit in a beach chair and watch tv through the little mesh window with a beverage.
customer_reviews.author: Mario D. Bernal

customer_reviews.title: Great fort that folds down small
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as gift for friends 4 yr old and he loves it. Is super easy to set up and love that it doesn’t take up a lot of space and kids toys always clutter and didn’t want to give another gift that took up space. Will probably get one for my son as well as soon as he’s old enough to not potentially touch the fan
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t include all pieces!
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t receive the Velcro pieces to the tent, so couldn’t put it up for my daughter tonight. Will have to buy some tomorrow.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Tempel

customer_reviews.title: Awesome fort!
customer_reviews.text: My kids LOVE this fort! Great quality. So simple to set up, just attach to fan and turn it on. Very roomy inside, I have 3 kids and they have plenty of room and I have been in there with them also! Comes with a nylon bag to store it in when not in use. We will start buying these for gifts, everyone should have one of these!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Garner

customer_reviews.title: 20 inch box fan is a must and use it on low.
customer_reviews.text: My kids love making forts with blankets and chairs every single weekend. I searched for kids forts on here and found Airfort. This is by far the best money ever spent. This was a Christmas Eve gift so they could camp out in it before Christmas. They are in it as I type this. They love it. Wish I found it sooner. I was worried about two things with this. 1. That it would t inflate as intended and 2. It would be too much wind inside for them to sleep in. It inflated as intended and it is not too breezy inside as long as you keep the fan on low. 5🌟’s all the way.
customer_reviews.author: Mark L

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it!
customer_reviews.text: I hope these folks make millions off the Air Fort! My life as a parent has become much more enjoyable now that I’m not having tie up sheets and prop pillows throughout the living room! My son got this for for his fifth birthday and has slept in it since receiving it five days ago. He can turn the fan off and on and it pops right up. It’s in his room and can easily be put away in a matter of seconds. It’s also roomy enough inside to sit comfortably. We are looking forward to many movie nights I the Air Fort. I only wish we had gotten one years ago!
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: What a great idea!!!! So easy to use and store
customer_reviews.text: This is such a great find! It quickly inflated with a box fan (NOT INCLUDED SO MAKE SURE YOU HAVE ONE ON HAND), stays up as long as the fan is running, very spacious (both of us can fit with our 2 kids inside, sitting upright). Super cute! Would make an amazing gift!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Atherton

customer_reviews.title: Be the coolest parent ever
customer_reviews.text: This thing is AWESOME. I absolutely despise putting things together/setting things up. But this was so easy that it didn't trigger me at all. Literally all you you do is attach 4 pieces of Velcro(provided) to the 4 corners of your box fan, lay that fort out, attach the fort Velcro to the fan, turn on the fan, and bam. Done. Amazing. The kids love it, and we love how cool, easy, and inexpensive it is. Buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Howard-Crow

customer_reviews.title: very spacious and fun for all ages.
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old loves it. As for the durability, we will see how long it lasts with our crazy family. Its very large (we can fit two adults, two large dogs, and our son inside comfortably). You also don't have to worry about it caving in and suffocating any kids since it has no bottom. It also seems to "hover" just above the floor so the air or any occupants can escape. It is also very cool inside due to the breeze from the fan. Overall, very happy with this purchase and I would definitely recommend this to anyone with or without kids of any age.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Yoder

customer_reviews.title: Best boy fort EVER made!
customer_reviews.text: The ultimate fort for boys! My kids ALWAYS want to build forts and drag every blanket out around the house. This fort is big and fits our whole family, including our full size golden doodle. My boys LOVE this fort. Be sure to buy a box fan to attach it to and blow it up!
customer_reviews.author: CMCollins3

customer_reviews.title: Parent Sanity Saver!
customer_reviews.text: One of the best Amazon purchases ever made! I am so tired of my kiddos taking the cushions off the couch and blankets off of beds to build a fort! Then they cry when the ceiling falls in. This fort, along with any box fan is a sanity saver! Be careful opening the package. I assumed it would be inside it’s own product box, but it was packaged in a plastic package and when I opened the box (with a box cutter) I cut right through the bag and into the storage sack! Either way this is awesome!!
customer_reviews.author: TR

customer_reviews.title: Thought it was going to be one of those things that don't work great
customer_reviews.text: This airfort is pretty nifty. A bit on the expensive side when you add in the purchase of the fan but our kids love it. It recovers well from them going in and out. I assumed it would flop over and id be constantly fixing it but thats not been the case.
customer_reviews.author: boomerang

customer_reviews.title: It's huge and lots of fun
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my mother so that her grandchildren have something fun to look forward to when going to Grandma's house. Super easy setup. It's actually very big! Us adults even use it for a fun wine night for an evening.... We had a blast
customer_reviews.author: DreamandBelieve

customer_reviews.title: Best gift ever!
customer_reviews.text: I never write reviews and I just had to about this product after winning best x-mas gift for my 3 year old nephew. He loved it! It provides endless fun because he will spend an hour trying to knock it down and another hour taking his nap inside. He now asks for “fort time” so cute. I love that there is a window I can see in when it is inflated. The only downside is I had to fabricate a makeshift holder for the fan cause it will knock over easy ending all the fun.
customer_reviews.author: John Green

customer_reviews.title: Great for the tall family!
customer_reviews.text: My husband is 6'6 and I am 6 foot, the problem we have had with other tents in the past is that we cannot fit our family of three in them. Not this time! We all fit comfortably! And thanks to the fan, it's nice and cool in this Summer weather. I don't understand the most "helpful" review, you plug it into a fan, done. You lift it up to go under, done. It doesn't deflate when you go under, unless you have a garbage fan. Get yourself a good box fan and call it a fun day!
customer_reviews.author: M. Haynes

customer_reviews.title: Very roomy
customer_reviews.text: Sent this to my 4 y/o grandson who’s into forts. It arrived on time and was set up in minutes. I also bought the box fan to make sure there was nothing to prevent him from enjoying it right away. As I FaceTimed with him, we went inside. It was tall enough for him to jump and also could hold his father and little brother comfortably! There was no floor so he also enjoyed “sneaking out” from the bottom! When not in use, folds up for easy storage!
customer_reviews.author: Christine L Gray

customer_reviews.title: Great Fort for Kids
customer_reviews.text: This was a whim buy for my son and it's pretty awesome. Only needs a standard box fan. Fort inflates big enough that 3 kids and two adults were able to sit in independently. Hovers a little bit off the ground, but barely deflates even when someone comes in or leaves. My kids love playing in it. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: WY

customer_reviews.title: Olivia loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter wanted this tent for Christmas. It's cute! A fan keeps it inflated! Its a nice size, plenty of room to play and when she's done with it....shut the fan off and roll it up. Light weight, easily packed away, great price, and most of all....fun!
customer_reviews.author: Gigi

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This fort is amazing! We have a little boy who has a blast playing in this. We just turn on the fan and it is blown up and ready! Love the little window so we can see inside, very well designed, and has more space inside then we were expecting. Two thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: FrugalButFair

customer_reviews.title: Our kiddos LOVE this air fort
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect little gift for kids! Our children have seemed to truly enjoy this airfort, there is enough space for our family of four to all fit in there(sitting) and still have some room. It is extremely easy to set up and VERY easy storage!
customer_reviews.author: Anna K

customer_reviews.title: Received defective
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited to get this for my 6 yo son to play with during the quarantine but noticed there was a 3-4” rip in the seem once it was inflated. It still stays up but I am concerned with long term durability and the rip getting larger with play and eventually not being able to use it at all. I don’t want to deal with the hassle of returning it during this time (not sure a trip to the post office to do so would qualify as “essential”) and he’s still currently able to play with it so it’s not a complete loss but, for the price, I’m super disappointed to receive a ripped product.
customer_reviews.author: Emily M.

customer_reviews.title: Great cool fort for kids
customer_reviews.text: My kids loved it. Easy to use and put away. I bought separate square fan from Amazon and it worked well. Advantage of ordering from Amazon is free shipping vs having to pay shipping if ordering directly from manufacturer's website.
customer_reviews.author: Handyman Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great design!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased for 18 month old and 3 yr old. They love it. It inflates well. I fit in it easily and no 'meltdowns' because it collapsed. I think in the summer we will love the fan aspect of it. Have not used outdoors, but so far seems very durable. Would I purchase again? (I got on sale for $36). Definitely.
customer_reviews.author: Kemar

product_meta.title: The Original AirFort Build A Fort in 30 Seconds, Inflatable Fort for Kids (Mod About Gray)
feature_bullets: ✅ BUILD IN SECONDS, PLAY FOR HOURS - No Assembly Required. AirFort inflates in less than 30 seconds, sets up and cleans up in no time, no Pillows, no Sheets, no Mess! The AirFort Size is 77" wide x 50" tall.

✅ DURABLE AND BREATHABLE CONSTRUCTION - Perfect for Parties, Playdates & Sleepovers! AirFort is big enough to accommodate lots of guests! At 6.5 ft. in diameter and over 4 ft tall, AirFort is roomy so no one gets left out. Invite all your friends!
✅ THE PERFECT ALTERNATIVE TO SCREEN TIME - Honest tech-free constructive play that helps bring out your child's ever growing imagination. At AirFort we believe that fun brings the family together.
✅ SAFE, WORRY-FREE FORTS FOR KIDS OF ALL AGES - Child Safety Tested and Approved. No floor for an easy entrance and exit, viewing window for kids to see in and out, and mesh fan divider.
✅ WORKS WITH ANY STANDARD BOX FAN - Includes: The Original Patented AirFort, Matching Carrying Bag, 4 Adhesive Square Fan Tabs, Easy to Read Instruction / Safety Manual. (BOX FAN NOT INCLUDED)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars2,422 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
